t_P3Xg44aPFO724yH.name: Double-Jointed
t_P3Xg44aPFO724yH.notes: May ignore up to -5 in penalties for close quarters

mOY1XT_25ZggUot00.name: Diffuse
mOY1XT_25ZggUot00.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mv0RSOfSi--hTX3TN.name: Homogenous
mv0RSOfSi--hTX3TN.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mW1nXjgQ2A_H22VPF.name: No Blood
mW1nXjgQ2A_H22VPF.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mFyZ6y4yS219Aoeuj.name: No Brain
mFyZ6y4yS219Aoeuj.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

m8ZdWORpw8kaBgPYb.name: No Eyes
m8ZdWORpw8kaBgPYb.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m3q-sxRZB_xx78IuK.name: No Head
m3q-sxRZB_xx78IuK.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mL36KevwbLtpfaojR.name: No Neck
mL36KevwbLtpfaojR.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mh3dncPLf7n3M-A3J.name: No Vitals
mh3dncPLf7n3M-A3J.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

m1t9sbxZwBzXU5vqs.name: Unliving
m1t9sbxZwBzXU5vqs.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
